528220.name: Rocket Riot - Soundtrack by SonicPicnic
528220.description:
The official Rocket Riot soundtrack from the composers of SonicPicnic, includes 11 unique audio tracks and 1 exploding mega mix.
The album offers 52.36 minutes of music in mp3 format. The tracks will be downloaded to your Steam folder and Steam Music Player.

Track list:
01 Rocket Riot Theme
02 Go Bananaman
03 Blockheads
04 The Haunted House
05 The Big Evil
06 Funky Blocks
07 Something Weird
08 Do The Pinball (And Get Dizzy)
09 Military Madness
10 Warehouse
11 Rockit
12 Rocket Riot Mega Mini Master Mix
